duties_responsibilities.duty: Characterize small-molecules using chemical techniques (e.g., NMR, MS) and/or in vitro receptor assays.
Prepare written manuscripts, operating procedures, and patent applications.
Participate in weekly group meeting discussions and presentations.
Assist in the maintenance of laboratory supplies and instrumentation.
Comply with University & Department safety policies.
Perform other related duties and participate in special projects as assigned.

education_certification.credential: PhD degree in chemistry, medicinal chemistry, chemical biology, or a related discipline.
Previous publications in the field of chemistry.
Previous experience in planning and conducting complex, multi-step organic synthesis.
Previous experience conducting assays for GPCR and/or ion channels.
